Blog.post: sebenernya nih posting terlambat dua hari ..soalnya waktu itu nguantuk banget abis nonton bola si arsenal, sekarang baru sempet dueh...hmmm akhirnya Arsenal juara Liga Inggris...memang udah sepantasnya tim andalan gw ini juara...hehehhe..tapi gw kurang puas ngeliat dia ngelawan Livepool, permainanya udah bagus, cuman si Lehman itu yang bikin gw kecewa...yang akhirnya membuahkan gol pinalti dan kedudukan jadi 2-2, tapi karena nilai skornya jauh dari yang laen...yah tetep ajeh ga ngaruh yang laen...minimal memang seri ajah dia udah menang, cuman gw ga ngarepin seri...gw ngarepin dia menang...eh si Lehman (kiper) bikin kecewa...yah sudahlah...udah koq...:-p. .... xxiiaaaoooo Arsenal...Arsene Wenger, Henry, Bergkamp, Pires...

again...another malem minggu kelabu...hmmmm...yang pasti hari ini kaga jadi jalan sama anak-anak ....gagal total...jalan-jalan ini udah direncanaain sejak 2 minggu yang lalu...tapi selalu gagal...heheheh mungkin emang uda ada curse...segala sesuatu kaga boleh direncanaain...hmm..bertentangan sekali sama seseorang yang pernah gw kenal...mungkin ...different orang/komunitas different situation...but anyway...karena jalan2 hari ini gagal yah gw cuman buka friendster...liat2...apa ada temen gw yang ngisi testi ? :-P,ternyata cuman 2 orang...n ada satu orang yang ngirim gw message....yah lumayan...trus untuk ngabisin waktu gw nonton smallville 2 ...hmmm...lagi2..gw susah stop untuk ga nonton...the next episode..again...and again..and again....seru banget sih pelemnya...heheheh...oks deh..that's all folks for today...oh iyah..satu lagi...MU kalah dari Liverpool...mampusloh..kekekeke, sombong sih si ferguson..pake ngina pelatih and tim andalan gw, si arsene wengernya Arsenal...goodnight....

wow...i've just seen smallville movie seasons 1, its kind of cool. i can't help watching the next episode continuoslly. they are all playing good, and i like those all characters, i love it. why don't u try to watch the movie with anyone you like, for me...it's better with some u love, and likes wathing movie :-P, come on wake up!!! ups!!! :-) i'm thinking of something else..:-(. Anyway i just want to tell movie, musics, poems, good smells can bring you to other world but do not expect to much, get real!!, life is sometimes painfull and beatifull. explore it, you'll know how it feel. watching you outside there without me by your side it makes me full of pain and never end with happyness, but hopes you are happy there...c",)

late is better than nothing...:-) my younger brother has his birthday on 22nd of March but we celebrate it today with surprise... he did suprise and got many present. he looks so happy. i'm tired have to take care the celebration but ends with happiness because seeing him so happy... happy birthday brother...good night...

i've lost them i've lost almost all my best friend... i can't touch them i can't hear what they say... even i got another best friends... but they can't be replaced... i'm afraid they mad to me... i'm afraid they do not want me.. i'm afraid of losing them... i'm sad... ...hopes they are always just fine... ...hopes their dreams come true... this words might not be good, but i always remember you... my best friends...

But I'm not crazy, I'm just a little unwell I know right now you can't tell But stay awhile and maybe then you'll see A different side of me I'm not crazy, I'm just a little impaired I know right now you don't care But soon enough you're gonna think of me And how I used to be...me

doh...i've very weird dream..it's weird cause...uhhmmm...i can't say anything, speechless... what i feel ?? happy, sad, funny, exciting, confuse, asking to myself, headache,...i thinks this is the weirdest...speechless... speechless....

hmmm...dah lama juga gw kaga ngisi neh blogger..ampe2 password hampir lupa..maklum gw lagi sibuk mo uzian...hmmm...pemilu tahap I dah selesai, dari angka yang ada terlihat siapa yang maju dan siapa yang mundur...kebetulan saya tidak memilih yang maju...hmmm...semoga ajah demokrasi di indonesia ini berjalan lancar dan jujur tentunya...sudahlah teman, rekan, kawanku jangan sesali dengan pilihan rakyat itulah yang terjadi ....namun nasi belum menjadi bubur mari kita dukung demokrasi dan pemerintahan yang akan datang dan tentunya dengan tidak sedikit mengurangi kritik kita pada pemerintahan yang akan datang...*** kok gw jadi so tua ngomongin politik seh..sotoyyy *** freespech men!! :-p
